name: Holistic Wellness
detail: Ayurveda focuses on overall well-being by addressing physical, mental, and emotional health, promoting harmony in the body and mind.

name: Personalized Approach
detail: It tailors treatments to an individual's unique constitution and imbalances, providing personalized care for specific health needs.

name: Natural Healing
detail: Ayurveda relies on natural remedies like herbs, diet, and lifestyle adjustments, minimizing the use of synthetic drugs and chemicals.

name: Preventive Care
detail: Emphasizing prevention through daily routines and seasonal adjustments, Ayurveda helps maintain good health and prevent diseases.

name: Stress Reduction
detail: Ayurveda offers stress management techniques, including meditation and yoga, to improve mental well-being and reduce stress-related ailments.

name: Complementary Medicine
detail: It can complement conventional medicine, offering an integrative approach to health and wellness by addressing root causes and promoting balance.
